Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Hey Dave, sorry this is a bit of a pain. We're removing roles in v2.0.0, so it shouldn't be a problem there. We think this is fixed by using "service" in replace of "serviceDiscovery" - can you give that a go? We've got an issue here for updating docs in v1.4.x for that here: https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FGJ-42
